Instant Pot

Delicious Instant Pot Meals in Minutes

Supereasy
30min
Easy

Even so, many believe there are less problematic and more effective ways to approach outdoors recommends structural reforms for the USA, such as pushing for the promotion of state parks (which are typically less crowded than national parks) and more broadly backing initiatives that educate the public about environmental stewardship.

Ingredients:

  • 1 cup cornmeal
  • 1 cup all-purpose flour
  • 1 tablespoon baking powder
  • 1/2 teaspoon salt
  • 1 cup buttermilk
  • 1/4 cup melted butter
  • 1 slice whole-grain bread
  • 1 cup shredded cheddar cheese
  • Fresh herbs for garnish (cilantro, chives, or parsley)

Ingredients:

  • 1. Mix cornmeal, flour, baking powder, and salt.
  • 2. Add buttermilk, melted butter, and egg. Fold in cheese and jalapeños.
  • 3. While the bread is toasting, mash the ripe avocado in a bowl and season with salt and pepper.
